name: Cactus Punch Parry
description:
Parry the perilous punches of the cacti menace to interrupt them, then strike with a counterattack!

Controls

Arrow Keys or WASD to move around

Up or W to Jump/Double Jump

Z or Shift to parry an incoming attack

Z or Shift + a direction AFTER a successful parry to attack in that direction

Notes

This was created for GDFG Monthly Jam #20.

Programming and Art by Nuzcraft

Rainy Hearts font by Camellina

Sounds by Chiptone - https://sfbgames.itch.io/chiptone

Music by Ted Kerr - https://opengameart.org/content/desert-theme-8bit-chiptune-theme

Source code available at: https://github.com/nuzcraft/gdfg_monthly_jam_20
